name: Corona Attack (frizydev)
description:
This is our first game when we are in senior high school. Developed by S2Z Team

Instruction before play the game :

Press W,A,S,D in keyboard to walk

Press R in keyboard to reload

Press Shift in keyboard to run

Press Space in keyboard to jump

Press Left click in Mouse to shoot

Press Right click in Mouse to aim

This game is still developing, give your suggestions and opinions in the comments column.
